content: **yarn ** use any slightly fuzzy smoothly twisted yarn jackie s model bunny was knit with about 35 yards of yarn and made a six inch long bunny **needles ** a size smaller than label recommendations is best to make a firm fabric that the stuffing won t peak out of **from the pattern description ** *make a bunny out of a square piece of knitting it s almost as clever as pulling a rabbit out of hat * knitted bunny is a downloadable pattern valued at $5 00 translation credits coniglietto da un quadrato di maglia italian version thanks to paolo dalle piane conejito tejido spanish version thanks to paula toledo gebreid konijntje dutch version stickad kanin swedish version thanks to yvonne peelen-pel
